description: Username of the assignee responsible for this to‑do item.
Sequence number for this to‑do entry within the user’s list; used for ordering or uniqueness.
Source screen/module or process that generated the to‑do item; likely the originating application form or workflow step (confirm with SME).
Short task title or action required for the to‑do item.
Identifier of the related work order linked to this to‑do item.
Date/time the item or its related work order was issued or assigned to the user; confirm exact scope with SME.
Target due date/time or completion goal for the to‑do item; confirm if this reflects SLA due date.
Priority code for the item (e.g., Normal/High/Low) used to sort or escalate tasks.
Detailed description or instructions for what needs to be done.
User who created or added this to‑do item.
Timestamp when the to‑do item was created.
User who last modified this to‑do item.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the to‑do item.
